text: Stranda village Geiranger Fjord Stranda Fjord Trail Race is a long distance race with meters of vertical climb. The race attracts many international runners and takes place since 2015 in the mountains around Stranda on the Norwegian coast. The course takes the runners along the Geirangerfjord. ==Winners== The course records are for men 4:02:15 by Sindre Hoff (2016) and for women 4:39:13 by Yoie Bohlin (2016).
